overview: After decades defined by owners, GMs, and opponents, the 21st century ushered in an era of Cleveland Cavaliers history commanded by one man. First, the Cavaliers chose the homegrown prodigy with a lucky lottery ticket. When they failed him, he departed ... then chose to return, assembling the team that reached the precipice of a championship at the moment we find them in 2016.  Let's remember how that all happened. Let's talk about LeBron James.
tagline: The Cleveland Cavaliers' 46-year title quest deserves a deep, deeeeep rewind
title: CHOSEN
